item.title: A whale bought 1.84 million ENA tokens at an average price of $0.7.
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale disposed of PEPE and PENDLE worth $1.29 million and subsequently purchased 1.84 million ENA at an average purchase price of $0.7.

item.title: Analysis: Jack Ma has indirectly invested in ETH and holds approximately 11.15% of Yunfeng Financial's shares
item.description: On September 2nd, based on public data, Jack Ma, the founder of Alibaba, indirectly holds approximately 11.15% of Yunfeng Financial through Yunfeng Fund. He holds 29.85% of Yunfeng Financial Holdings Limited and 40% (non-voting) of Yunfeng Innovation in Shanghai.Today, the Hong Kong-listed company Yunfeng Financial (00376.HK) announced that the Board of Directors has given approval to purchase ETH as a reserve asset in the open market. As of the announcement date, the Group has accumulated the purchase of 10,000 ETH in the open market, with a total investment cost (including fees and expenses) of USD 44 million. The funds used for this purchase are sourced from the Group's internal cash reserves, and the purchased ETH is classified as an investment asset in the Group's financial statements.

item.title: Pulte: Just received major news about Federal Reserve Governor Powell
item.description: On September 2nd, Mark Calabria, the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, just received significant news regarding Fed Governor Cook. (GoldTen)Previously, Bill Pulte, the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, accused Cook of lying on loan applications to obtain more favorable terms, alleging mortgage fraud. Some analysts believe that if Cook were to resign, Trump would have the opportunity to appoint a fourth Fed governor, thereby obtaining a majority position on the seven-member board.

item.title: US Stocks Mixed as Cryptocurrency Stocks Rally During the Session, Strategy Up 2%
item.description: On September 2nd during the trading session, the three major U.S. stock indexes narrowed their losses. The Dow was down by 1%. Bitcoin witnessed a short-term surge and broke through $111,500. Some crypto-related stocks also showed an upward trend, including:ETHZilla (ETHZ) increased by 2.1%.Bitmine (BMNR) rose by 1.17%.MicroStrategy (MSTR) went up by 2%.MARA Holdings (MARA) advanced by 1.8%.Riot Blockchain (RIOT) increased by 2.1%.

item.title: Bitget has launched a U-based Q perpetual contract, with leverage ranging from 1 to 50x.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per an official announcement, Bitget has declared the commencement of a U-based Q perpetual contract, featuring a leverage ranging from 1 to 50x. Simultaneously, the contract trading BOT will be made accessible.

item.title: Binance Alpha's latest SOMI airdrop single-ticket profit is approximately $63
item.description: September 2nd, Binance Alpha has initiated the launch of Somnia (SOMI), with a current valuation of 100 million US dollars. In the initial stage, each eligible user is entitled to receive an airdrop of 100 Somnia (SOMI) tokens. Based on the current price, the estimated single airdrop reward for this event is approximately 63 US dollars.

item.title: Binance Earn, One-Click Buy, Instant Swap, Leverage, and Futures will soon be available for Somnia (SOMI).
item.description: On September 2nd, according to an official statement, Binance Earn, One-Click Buy, Swap, Margin, and Futures will list Somnia (SOMI).Isolated Margin and Cross Margin will start to add SOMI as a borrowable asset at 22:30 (UTC+8) on September 2, 2025, along with the SOMI/USDT and SOMI/USDC Isolated Margin and Cross Margin trading pairs.As was previously announced, Binance will list SOMI spot trading at 22:30 (UTC+8) on September 2nd.

item.title: Bitcoin Experiences Short-Term Recovery, Surges Above $111,000
item.description: On September 2nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin witnessed a short-term rally and broke through $111,000. It is currently trading at $110,762, with a 24-hour increase of 1.56%.

item.title: Starknet: Identified Network Outage Cause, Deploying Fix Solution
item.description: On September 2nd, the Starknet team officially made an announcement that the reason for the network outage has been determined. They are currently in the process of deploying a fix and anticipate that Starknet will resume its operation shortly.

item.title: Crypto.com is partnering with Underdog to launch a sports prediction market in the United States.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per TheBlock, Underdog has entered into a partnership with Crypto.com's Derivatives North America. This partnership enables the launch of a sports prediction market in 16 states. The focus is on states where sports betting is not yet legal, like California and Texas. Once launched, fans will have the ability to trade on the outcomes of major leagues such as the NFL, NBA, MLB, and college football, and the prices will update in real-time.However, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and federal courts are still engaged in discussions regarding whether the sports prediction market constitutes gambling, encroaches on state rights, or violates the Commodity Exchange Act.
